title: Need for Speed: World [Offline] (RUS/ENG/MULTi) REPACK
description:
Description: 
After creating the character and selecting the first car, the beginner is sent to race against the computer. This race will allow you to master the basics of management. Then you get to the city, having looked at the map of which, you will see the existing races. You can get to them either by arriving at the launching point or by submitting an application for participation remotely. Some of the races are limited to the class of cars, there are three in all. But the newcomer will have a hard time. At the initial stage, overtaking someone is unrealistic. Have to wait and save money to upgrade the car. 
Features: 
- A huge functionality in the garage. Here you can not only tune an old car, but also buy a new one, change the look of the driver and view your achievements; 
- five types of races: sprint, chase, team rescue, circuit, trip. 

NOTES> 

Starting the game: 
We launch from the label - Need for Speed - World , click Change game exe path - select the path to the file nfsw.exe (where the game was installed) Open (You will see this offer only at the first start). 
If everything is rightfully done, click on Launch Game, then the game will start (by default in English)
